name: Color Factory
summary: Welcome to COLOR FACTORY, an immersive mixed-reality idle game where your hands hold the power to create and control. Using intuitive hand gestures, build and optimize your very own factory right in your living space. Manage resources, construct new buildings, and experiment with unique color combinations—all with simple movements of your hands. As an idle game, COLOR FACTORY continues to produce and grow even when you're not actively playing, ensuring that your factory is always expanding. Engage in a...
